events.message: The claimant reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at a busy intersection during rush hour.
Based on the report, the claim has been categorised under 'Auto Accident' to ensure proper handling and investigation.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to manage the case and to coordinate all next steps efficiently.
The claimant was officially informed that their auto accident claim has been received and is now in process.
The claimant was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and a police accident report for thorough evaluation.
All required documents, including vehicle damage photos and the official police report, were submitted by the claimant.
The claim investigation began to verify the details of the vehicle collision and assess liability and damage extent.
Investigation concluded confirming the claimant was not at fault, and damage estimates were verified by the assessor.
A settlement proposal has been made to cover the repair costs and any additional expenses incurred due to the accident.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the timely handling and communication throughout the claims process.
Final approval was granted to proceed with the payment for the auto accident vehicle repair costs.
The settlement amount was successfully transferred to the claimant's account for vehicle repairs and associated charges.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirmation that all payments were received and repairs completed.
All claim documentation and correspondence were archived for future reference and record-keeping purposes.
